name: ADOSecurityScanner
description: Scan Azure DevOps components for security issues.
author: azsdktm

inputs.name: AzureDevOpsConnectionName
inputs.label: Azure DevOps Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure DevOps connection required to access resources

inputs.name: OrgName
inputs.label: Organization Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Org name for which scan needs to be performed. Default value is set to current organization.

inputs.name: ProjectNames
inputs.label: Project Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of projects against which Security Verification should be run. Default value is set to current project.

options.Org_Project_User: Scan Organization and Project configuration controls only
options.BuildReleaseSvcConnAgentPoolUser: Scan build/release/service connection/agent pool controls only

inputs.name: BuildNames
inputs.label: Build Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of builds against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run or use '*' to scan all builds.

inputs.name: ReleaseNames
inputs.label: Release Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of releases against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run or use '*' to scan all releases.

inputs.name: ServiceConnectionNames
inputs.label: Service Connection Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of service connections against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run or use '*' to scan all service connections.

inputs.name: AgentPoolNames
inputs.label: Agent Pool Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of agent pools against which Security Verification Tests (SVTs) should be run or use '*' to scan all agent pools.

inputs.name: EnableOMSLogging
inputs.label: Send events to Log Analytics
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option to publish SVT evaluation results to a Log Analytics Workspace (specified via environment variables).
